name: It was happiness
description:
This game made in 3 days for the  Game Dev Unlocked Game Jam #5 - Winter Edition

Story

A human goes to the magic forest and tries to take profit from the animals.   But a fairy is there to help them. 

  • Movement - WASD or Arrows
  • Look around and select objects - Mouse 
  • Pause  / Unpause - ESC
